sentences.sContent: My baby gets upset when I leave the room.
sentences.sCn: 我一离开房间宝宝就会不安。

sentences.sContent: Before leaving the train, make sure you have all your belongings with you.
sentences.sCn: 下火车前一定要带好随身物品。
请在七号交叉路口驶离高速公路。

sentences.sContent: My youngest boy has not left my side (= has stayed near me ) since his daddy was killed.
sentences.sCn: 我最小的儿子自从他爸爸死后就没有离开过我的身边。
